EmailTemplate.subject: Customer Experience News Report, Aug. 28, 2015
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<https://www.facebook.com/HoneywellAero?rf=107633562593387> <http://twitter.com/Honeywell_Aero> <http://www.youtube.com/honeywell> <https://plus.google.com/109803702550636260475> <http://www.linkedin.com/company/honeywell-aerospace> Allowing the customer to share their story is an important part of product development.
"When customers share their story, they’re not just sharing pain points. They’re actually teaching you how to make your product, service, and business better. Your customer service organization should be designed to efficiently communicate those issues.” - Kristin Smaby, “Being Human is Good Business"
